## ExtendedStylesInjectOptions interface

Styles loader options.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ExtendedStylesInjectOptions extends StylesInjectOptions 
```
<b>Extends:</b> StylesInjectOptions

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [custom?](./postcss-es-modules.extendedstylesinjectoptions.custom.md) | { importStatement: string; injectStatement: string; } | <i>(Optional)</i> Custom injection script. Use this property to use custom styles to DOM/Node injection. |
|  [injectMode?](./postcss-es-modules.extendedstylesinjectoptions.injectmode.md) | 'lazy' \| 'ondemand' \| 'instant' \| 'none' | <i>(Optional)</i> The mode of the styles injection. Options: - <code>lazy</code> - the stylesheet will be injected on the first use of the style class name within the code - <code>ondemand</code> - the stylesheet will be injected only when the <code>styles.inject()</code> method will be called - <code>instant</code> - the stylesheet will be injected on the module load - <code>none</code> - the stylesheet will be never injected, to inject it to the DOM you will need to import css content Default: 'lazy' |
|  [moduleType?](./postcss-es-modules.extendedstylesinjectoptions.moduletype.md) | 'esm' \| 'cjs' | <i>(Optional)</i> Generated code modules type. Options: - 'esm' - ecmascript 6 modules - 'cjs' - commonjs<!-- -->Default 'esm' |
|  [script?](./postcss-es-modules.extendedstylesinjectoptions.script.md) | 'embed' \| 'eject' \| 'import' | <i>(Optional)</i> The way how the styles injector script will be referred from the generated source. Options: - <code>embed</code>: embedding loader script in the target source - <code>eject</code>: the loader script will be ejected to the provided scriptEjectPath - <code>import</code>: the loader script will be referred by the import statement<!-- -->Default: 'import' |
|  [scriptEjectPath?](./postcss-es-modules.extendedstylesinjectoptions.scriptejectpath.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The path where the script code will be ejected. This option is required if 'eject' value is set for the script type. |
|  [scriptType?](./postcss-es-modules.extendedstylesinjectoptions.scripttype.md) | 'ts' \| 'js' | <i>(Optional)</i> The script type. Options: - <code>ts</code>: typescript - <code>js</code>: javascript<!-- -->Default: 'js' |
